text: The Universit√§t Mainz (; abbreviation: JGU) is a university in Mainz, Germany. It was founded in the year 1477. In 2012, there were more than 36,000 students. The University of Mainz has ten faculties: * Theology * Social sciences, Media and Sport * Jurisprudence and Economics * Medicine * Philosophy * Linguistics * History * Physics, Mathematics and Computer science * Chemistry, Pharmacy and Earth sciences * Biology == Other websites == * Website of the University of Mainz Category:1477 establishments Mainz, University Category:Mainz Category:1470s establishments in Europe Category:15th-century establishments in Germany
title: University of Mainz
